title: When did he find the first crocodile in the Chicago River?
subtitle: Rumor has it that an alligator discovered in the Chicago River in June 2008 was the first ever found in that body of water. Let's look a little deeper.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The crocodile captured in the Chicago River in June 2008 was the first such creature ever found in that body of water.
